title: 2 Wheels
abstract: Australians have had a long love affair with the humble bike from Hubert Opperman in the 1920s or as a form of transport in the 1970s.
description: To coincide with the ever popular Tour de France, this package highlights Australians' love of the bicycle. Ranging from a bike museum in Devonport displaying over a 100 years of bicycle history - to celebrating women for their riding prowess during the Second World War - the exploits of Hubert Opperman, teaching children bike maintenance and road safety and cyclists fighting for the right to separate cycle ways in Canberra.
